title: Account Executive, SMB
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you.Account Executive, SMB
London, Remote (Hybrid).
 
 
About This Role
 
As an Account Executive, SMB at NICE – we are looking for someone to help us build up our business activities. Ultimately, you’ll help us meet and surpass business expectations and contribute to our company’s rapid and sustainable growth.
Working in a friendly, inclusive environment based on respect and recognition, you’ll be encouraged to aim high and deliver your best work. Mastering your professional craft, creating your own adventure, and bringing your positive can-do attitude to the table is a winning recipe for success with NICE.
 
What if we told you that you could make a bigger impact on the digitalization of the customer journey of your clients, overachieve your targets and take your career to the next level with one of our best performing teams in the CX space?
 
The Account Executive responsibilities include discovering and pursuing new sales prospects, negotiating deals and maintaining customer satisfaction. If you have excellent communication skills and feel comfortable reaching out to potential customers to demonstrate our services and products through email and phone, we’d like to meet you.
 
 
For this role:

You will have a minimum of 3 years field sales experience within DigitalCX or Contact Centre software industries.
You thrive on successfully selling software deals ether directly or through partner sales with a proven track record.
You’re a consultative seller that thinks outside the box to create value and business outcomes for potential customers.
You’re eager to deliver impact for your customers and your career.
You take pride in achieving a high level of competency in CRM forecasting, written and verbal communication skills.
You demonstrate success working with little to no direct daily supervision in a home office setting.

 
What You Can Expect from Us

Competitive salary with unlimited earning potential
Generous benefits to promote health and wellbeing
Option to work flexibly between home/office, reflecting our hybrid model
Exceptional opportunities for career growth and development
Vibrant workplace alongside like-minded people

 
As an Equal Opportunity, we’re committed to providing an inclusive environment that enables every employee to work to the best of their ability. We support equality, diversity and inclusion, and commit to hiring to increase diversity of thought without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, religion, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, age or any other characteristic protected by law or common sense.
 
In a world where you can be anything, be NICE.About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
